cookingTips: Keep butter cold and cut into small pieces for flaky layers in biscuits
Mix just until dough comes together; overmixing develops gluten and toughens biscuits
Cut biscuits straight down without twisting to allow even rise and tall, fluffy result
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the user why cold butter and minimal mixing are essential to biscuit success and how self-rising flour simplifies the formula.
